blocks.content: Your first step on this journey is to select the Linux distribution and architecture you are using.
Click **Connections > Add new connection** in the left-side menu.
Search for **Linux Server** in the search field.
Click on the **Linux Server** tile to select it.
Select the **operating system** that matches your Linux distribution (Debian for Ubuntu/Debian, RedHat for RHEL/Fedora/CentOS).
Select the **architecture** that matches your system (Amd64 for x86_64, Arm64 for aarch64).
If you are unsure of the architecture, run `uname -m` in your Linux terminal. If it returns `x86_64`, select **Amd64**. If it returns `aarch64`, select **Arm64**.
